text: The Château de Virieu is a castle in Pélussin, Loire, Rhône-Alpes, France. ==History== It was built in 1633 on the site of a previous castle built as early as 1173.French Ministry of Culture: Château de Virieu ==Architectural signifiance== It has been listed as an official historical monument by the French Ministry of Culture since 2001. ==References== Category:Châteaux in Loire (department) Category:Monuments historiques of Loire (department)
title: Château de Virieu (Loire)
